{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr value_type operator*() const;
}}

Returns the current element in the {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Let {{tti|current_}}, {{tti|end_}}, and {{tti|n_}} be the underlying {{rlp|/#Data members|data members}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|return views::take(ranges::subrange(current_, end_), n_)}}.

Before the invocation the expression {{c|1=current_ != end_}} must be {{c|true}}, otherwise the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element, which is an object of {{rlpi|/#Member types|value_type}}.
